summary: The Autonomy for Disabled Veterans Act (S. 1644) amends Title 38 of the United States Code to modify the Secretary of Veterans Affairs' authority regarding home health services for disabled veterans. It increases the amount for home improvements and structural alterations, adjusting it for inflation annually and establishing a limit of three such alterations per veteran. The bill distinguishes between veterans who applied for benefits before and after the bill's enactment and includes a rule of construction to clarify eligibility.
